# buttonNumber

**Instance Property**

The number of the mouse button that caused the navigation request.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var buttonNumber: UIEvent.ButtonMask { get }
```

```swift
@MainActor var buttonNumber: Int { get }
```

## Inspecting user actions

- **modifierFlags**: The modifier keys that were pressed at the time of the navigation request.
